senselogic.sitevision.api.redirect

Interface RedirectUtil


  • @Requireable(value="RedirectUtil")
public interface RedirectUtil
    Redirect utility interface (301 redirects for "old urls").

    An instance of the Sitevision class implementing this interface can be obtained via Utils.getRedirectUtil(). See Utils for how to obtain an instance of the Utils interface.

    Since:
    Sitevision 4.0.3
    Author:
    Magnus LÃ¶vgren

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addRedirectURI(Node aNode, String aRelativeURI)
      Adds a relative URI that should trigger a 301 redirect to a specific node.
      void addRedirectURIs(Node aNode, Collection<String> aRelativeURIs)
      Adds a collection of relative URIs that should trigger 301 redirects to a specific node.
      Set<String> getRedirectURIs(Node aNode)
      Gets all 301 redirect URIs registered for a specific node.
      void removeAllRedirectURIs(Node aNode)
      Removes all relative 301 redirect URIs from a specific node.
      void removeRedirectURI(Node aNode, String aRelativeURI)
      Removes a relative 301 redirect URI from a specific node.

    • Method Detail

      • getRedirectURIs

        Set<String> getRedirectURIs(Node aNode)
        Gets all 301 redirect URIs registered for a specific node.
        Parameters:
        aNode - a node, typically a sv:page
        Returns:
        a set of 301 redirect URIs for aNode, never null

      • addRedirectURI

        void addRedirectURI(Node aNode,
                    String aRelativeURI)
             throws IllegalArgumentException,
                    RepositoryException
        Adds a relative URI that should trigger a 301 redirect to a specific node.

        Permission note! Current user must have PermissionUtil.Permission.WRITE on aNode.

        Parameters:
        aNode - a node, typically a sv:page
        aRelativeURI - the relative URI that should trigger a 301 redirect to aNode.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if aNode is null or an invalid node, if aRelativeURI is null, whitespace-only or an absolute URI.
        RepositoryException - if current user is not authorized to alter aNode, if aNode is already locked or something else goes wrong

      • addRedirectURIs

        void addRedirectURIs(Node aNode,
                     Collection<String> aRelativeURIs)
              throws IllegalArgumentException,
                     RepositoryException
        Adds a collection of relative URIs that should trigger 301 redirects to a specific node.

        Permission note! Current user must have PermissionUtil.Permission.WRITE on aNode.

        Parameters:
        aNode - a node, typically a sv:page
        aRelativeURIs - a collection of relative URIs that should trigger 301 redirects to aNode.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if aNode is null or an invalid node, if aRelativeURI is null, empty or doesn't contain any non-whitespace only or an non-absolute URI.
        RepositoryException - if current user is not authorized to alter aNode, if aNode is already locked or something else goes wrong

      • removeRedirectURI

        void removeRedirectURI(Node aNode,
                       String aRelativeURI)
                throws IllegalArgumentException,
                       RepositoryException
        Removes a relative 301 redirect URI from a specific node.

        Permission note! Current user must have PermissionUtil.Permission.WRITE on aNode.

        Parameters:
        aNode - a node, typically a sv:page
        aRelativeURI - the relative URI that should be removed from aNode.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if aNode is null or an invalid node, if aRelativeURI is null, whitespace-only or an absolute URI.
        RepositoryException - if current user is not authorized to alter aNode, if aNode is already locked or something else goes wrong

      • removeAllRedirectURIs

        void removeAllRedirectURIs(Node aNode)
                    throws IllegalArgumentException,
                           RepositoryException
        Removes all relative 301 redirect URIs from a specific node.

        Permission note! Current user must have PermissionUtil.Permission.WRITE on aNode.

        Parameters:
        aNode - a node, typically a sv:page
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if aNode is null or an invalid node,
        RepositoryException - if current user is not authorized to alter aNode, if aNode is already locked or something else goes wrong

Sitevision - Portal and Content Management Made Easy
Sitevision is an advanced Java enterprise portal product and a portlet container (JSR 286) that implements Java Content Repository (JSR 283).
